text: 1:27 Matyu 11:25; Jems 2:5God kamaghsua, a nguazir kamɨn itir fofozir gumazamizibar amutɨ, me bar aghumsɨgham. Kamaghɨn, a gari, gumazamizir gavgaviba puvatɨgha nguazimɨn itir gumazamizibar damazimɨn nɨghnɨziba onganiziba, merara God me amɨsefe. God ghaze, a gavgaviba itir gumazamizibar amutɨ, me aghumsɨgham. Kamaghɨn, gumazamizir gavgaviba puvatɨgha nguazir kamɨn itir gumazamizibar damazimɨn itiba, merara God me amɨsefe.
